verses.verse: Blessed<WH835> is the man<WH376> that walketh<WH1980> not in the counsel<WH6098> of the ungodly<WH7563>, nor standeth<WH5975> in the way<WH1870> of sinners<WH2400>, nor sitteth<WH3427> in the seat<WH4186> of the scornful<WH3887>.
But his delight<WH2656> is in the law<WH8451> of the LORD<WH3068>; and in his law<WH8451> doth he meditate<WH1897> day<WH3119> and night<WH3915>.

And he shall be like a tree<WH6086> planted<WH8362> by the rivers<WH6388> of water<WH4325>, that bringeth forth<WH5414> his fruit<WH6529> in his season<WH6256>; his leaf<WH5929> also shall not wither<WH5034>; and whatsoever he doeth<WH6213> shall prosper<WH6743>.
The ungodly<WH7563> are not so: but are like the chaff<WH4671> which the wind<WH7307> driveth away<WH5086>.
Therefore the ungodly<WH7563> shall not stand<WH6965> in the judgment<WH4941>, nor sinners<WH2400> in the congregation<WH5712> of the righteous<WH6662>.
For the LORD<WH3068> knoweth<WH3045> the way<WH1870> of the righteous<WH6662>: but the way<WH1870> of the ungodly<WH7563> shall perish<WH6>.
